Mandate: Protect Zambia from external threats, assist civil authorities during emergencies, and safeguard infrastructure.
TopPriorities: Secure mineral-rich borders and transit corridors.
Support humanitarian logistics for disaster relief.
Cooperate with regional defense forces on cross-border crime interdiction.
ActiveOperations: Joint patrols with ZRA along borders to fight illicit smuggling.
Logistics support for government agencies and emergency services.
Intelligence sharing with police on organized crime funding illegal activities.

RecentActions.Title: Border security operation
RecentActions.Summary: Conducted patrols to prevent smuggling and illegal border crossings.

RecentActions.Title: Civil support mission
RecentActions.Summary: Provided engineering and logistical support for infrastructure protection.
